response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly impact and benefit your business operations. This innovative solution has been meticulously designed to address common challenges faced by companies in your industry, offering unparalleled efficiency and cost savings. Given its unique features and potential ROI, I estimate its value to be well above $1,000,000.

Considering its exceptional capabilities and the long-term benefits it promises, I am offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while securing a competitive edge in your market.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how this product can specifically enhance your business. I am confident it will be a valuable addition to your company's arsenal.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
